summary:
My first armor and mod upload.
CBBE, CBBE TBBP, and UNP
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#980000]Some background info...[/color]
It's my first armor, and practice run in the modding and modeling stuff, so it's really not top quality stuff... at least yet.
This project was mainly for learning how to get things done, and see what stuff i should and should not do in the process. That means better quality stuff in the future.
[color=#ffffff]All meshes and textures are made from scratch.[/color][/size][size=3]

[size=4][color=#980000]What the mod contains:[/color]
[size=3][size=4]4- piece armor consisting gloves, boots, cuirass and skirt with similar stats to dragonscale. Craftable, temperable and enchantable.
[/size]

[size=4][color=#980000]ETC[/color]
-Craft at forge in dragonscale sub category from dragonscales or type "help bloodleather" in console and "player.additem (ID of item) (amount of items you want)" to get

-The visual appearance of the armor in inventory and ground are same as hide armor (at least for now).

-If this mod actually catches attention, I will improve or remake it with improved meshes, much better textures, proper inventory models and maybe some additional armor pieces.

-Meshes and textures of the mod are named era2 in case you want to edit something

[color=#980000]Installation and Unistallation
[color=#ffffff]With NMM just like any mod. Just don't try to use the TBBP version without TBBP.

[/color]Permissions[/color]
Feel free to use resources of this mod, as long as you remember to credit me.

[color=#980000]Credits
[/color]Thanks for Caliente for outfit studio, saved a plenty of time
Nif skope

[/size]


[/size]
[/size]
[/size]
author: al1enoid
